Past Events

November 22
Workshop Technical

NLP Workshop

Join our introductory NLP workshop to explore some fundamental text processing techniques, such as n-gram models, Bag of Words, and TF-IDF. Learn how these techniques work, their role in text analysis, and how they can be used for feature extraction and representation in machine learning.

November 15
Guest Speaker Technical

Joy Zhang, Airbnb: Artificial Intelligence: The Past, Present and Future

Join Dr. Joy Zhang, Director of Engineering at Airbnb, as he shares insights from his journey through academia, startups, and big tech, discussing the evolution and future of AI technology.

November 8
Workshop Technical

How to Pitch Your Data

Learn the fundamentals of data visualization to effectively transform raw data into clear, impactful visuals for better insights and communication.
